trans-unit.source: Represents the control that displays a header that has a collapsible window that displays content.
trans-unit.target: 表示显示具有一个可折叠的窗口，显示内容的标头的控件。

trans-unit.source: Expander is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>, which means its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> properties can be of any type (such as string, image, or panel).
trans-unit.target: 扩展器是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>，这意味着其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A>属性可以是任何类型 （如字符串、 图像或面板）。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>类。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows an Expander control.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示扩展器控件。

trans-unit.source: ![Expander example](~/add/media/expanderexample.JPG "Expander example") If the content of the expanded window is too large for the window, you can wrap the content of the Expander in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control to provide scrollable content.
trans-unit.target: ![Expander 示例](~/add/media/expanderexample.JPG "Expander 示例")如果展开窗口的内容而言太大窗口，你可以包装中扩展器内容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>控件提供可滚动的内容。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: Scrolling capability is not automatically provided by the Expander control.
trans-unit.target: 扩展器控件未自动提供滚动功能。

trans-unit.source: For an Expander to work correctly, do not specify a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> on the Expander control when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.ExpandDirection%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection>.
trans-unit.target: 对于扩展器才能正常工作，无需指定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>上扩展器控制<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.ExpandDirection%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.ExpandDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, do not specify a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> on the Expander control when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.ExpandDirection%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection>.
trans-unit.target: 同样，未指定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>上扩展器控制<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.ExpandDirection%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.ExpandDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you set a size on the Expander control in the direction that the expanded content is displayed, the area that is defined by the size parameter is displayed with a border around it.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置的大小扩展器控件的方向上将显示的扩展的内容，由大小参数定义的区域会显示带有边框。

trans-unit.source: This area displays even when the window is collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 此区域显示即使窗口处于折叠状态。

trans-unit.source: To set the size of the expanded window, set size dimensions on the content of the Expander control or the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> that encloses the content.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置扩展的窗口的大小，请将大小维度设置的扩展器控件的内容或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>包含的内容。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: When an Expander control is the last element in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel>, the Expander is sized to fill the remaining area of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 扩展器控件时的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel>且扩展器大小以填充剩余的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel>区域</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel>中的最后一个元素

trans-unit.source: To prevent this, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel.LastChildFill%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel> to `false`, or make sure that the Expander is not the last element in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止此情况，将设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel.LastChildFill%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel>到`false`，请确保扩展器不是一种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel>中的最后一个元素或</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel.LastChildFill%2A>

trans-unit.source: The alignment of Expander content can be defined by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.HorizontalContentAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.VerticalContentAlignment%2A> properties on the control.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置定义扩展器内容的对齐方式<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.HorizontalContentAlignment%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.VerticalContentAlignment%2A>控件上的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.VerticalContentAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.HorizontalContentAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: These properties are applied to the header and to the contents of the expanded window.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性将应用于标题以及扩展的窗口中的内容。

trans-unit.source: Customizing the Expander Control To apply the same property settings to multiple Expander controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 扩展器控件到自定义适用于多个扩展器控件，使用的相同的属性设置<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 你可以修改默认<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>提供独特外观的控制。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the Expander, see [Expander Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的部件和特定于扩展器的状态，请参阅[扩展器样式和模板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in Expander control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 设置 visual 属性仅会产生作用如果该属性既存在扩展器控件的默认模板中，通过设置。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: 可以在的"更改 Visual 结构的控件"一节中找到的可视属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the content window of an <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"></xref> control closes and only the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*> is visible.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的内容的窗口<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"></xref>控制关闭仅和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>可见。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header*>

trans-unit.source: The Collapsed event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A> property changes from `true` to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Collapsed 事件发生时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A>属性更改从`true`到`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A>

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 标识<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander.Collapsed"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the direction in which the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"></xref> content window opens.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在其中的方向<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"></xref>内容窗口随即打开。

trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`||

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection"></xref> values that defines which direction the content window opens.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection"></xref>定义方向的值的内容的窗口随即打开。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ExpandDirection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.ExpandDirection*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.ExpandDirection*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.ExpandDirection*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the content window of an <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"></xref> control opens to display both its header and content.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的内容的窗口<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"></xref>控件打开以显示其标头和内容。

trans-unit.source: The Expanded event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A> property changes from `false` to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 在扩展事件发生时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A>属性更改从`false`到`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded%2A>

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 标识<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander.Expanded"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置是否<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"></xref>内容窗口是否可见。

trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|、 |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the content window is expanded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果内容的窗口已展开，则，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded*>

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander.Collapsed"></xref> event when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded*> property changes from <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander.Collapsed"></xref>事件时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded*>属性更改从<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>到<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded*>

trans-unit.source: Creates the implementation of <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 创建的实现<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>为<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ExpanderAutomationPeer"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个新<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ExpanderAutomationPeer"></xref>此<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander.Expanded"></xref> event when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded*> property changes from <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Expander.Expanded"></xref>事件时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded*>属性更改从<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>到<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Expander.IsExpanded*>
